detail_desc: Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a round neckline, small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Gently tailored jacket in a linen and viscose weave with narrow notch lapels, discreet side pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams. No fasteners. Lined.

V-neck jumpsuit in a linen and viscose weave with adjustable shoulder straps and a wide, detachable tie belt at the waist. Side pockets, a concealed zip in one side and wide, ankle-length legs. Lined at the top.
Socks in fine-knit nylon containing glittery threads.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boxy-style top in sweatshirt fabric with a turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boxy-style top in sweatshirt fabric with a turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with a sheen. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a deep V-neck at the front and a sewn-in wrapover with ties at one side.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in ribbed jersey. High waist with concealed elastication. Unlined.
Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with narrow, rounded shoulder straps.
Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with narrow, rounded shoulder straps.
Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with narrow, rounded shoulder straps.
Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with narrow, rounded shoulder straps.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with side stripes, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with side stripes, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with side stripes, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with side stripes, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with side stripes, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with side stripes, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a bodysuit, pair of shorts and T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Sleeveless bodysuit with press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Set with a bodysuit, pair of shorts and T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Sleeveless bodysuit with press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Metal earrings in various designs, one pair with thin hoops. Sizes from 2-4.2 cm.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar, cut-out section at the top of the front and long sleeves.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar, cut-out section at the top of the front and long sleeves.
Short, gently fitted dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with spaghetti shoulder straps.
Hat in felted fabric with a grosgrain band. Width of brim approx. 4 cm.
Long, hand-made earrings in resin, metal and plastic. Length 10.5 cm.
Bohemian blouse in soft, slub cotton jersey with elastication at the top and a woven flounce with broderie anglaise.
Bohemian blouse in soft, slub cotton jersey with elastication at the top and a woven flounce with broderie anglaise.
Bohemian blouse in soft, slub cotton jersey with elastication at the top and a woven flounce with broderie anglaise.
Straight-style maxi dress in ribbed, softly draping jersey with a V-neck front and back, and tie-top shoulder straps. Unlined.
Bucket hat in cotton twill. Lined. Width of brim approx. 5 cm.
Bucket hat in cotton twill. Lined. Width of brim approx. 5 cm.

All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Dance leotard in glossy jersey with short cap sleeves, a ballerina neckline with gathers at the top, a wide flounce at the hips and a lined gusset.
Skater skirt in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Skater skirt in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Calf-length skirt in viscose jersey with a sewn-in wrapover, elasticated waist and slit at the front. Unlined.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a text appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a text appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Vest top in airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a low neckline front and back.
Vest top in airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a low neckline front and back.
Vest top in airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a low neckline front and back.
Vest top in airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a low neckline front and back.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains, two with pendants. Adjustable length 43-50 cm.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains, two with pendants. Adjustable length 43-50 cm.

Leotard in stretch jersey with glittery details and decorative tassels at the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam at the waist and a lined, asymmetric, tiered tulle skirt. Detachable cape in tulle with a shimmering pattern.
Dress in glossy jersey with long sleeves and a motif on the front with glittery details. Seam at the waist and a satin-lined tulle skirt with multiple asymmetric tiers and a glittery top layer.
Fancy dress costume in velour and jersey with a glitter print. High, lightly padded collar at the back, long sleeves with asymmetric cuffs and a seam at the waist with a flared, lined tulle skirt.

Unicorn fancy dress costume. Sleeveless top section in brushed jersey at the front. Lightly padded bottom section with a head, legs and shimmering hooves. Padded, shimmering wings and a faux fur mane and tail.

Long dress in airy chiffon crêpe made partly from recycled polyester. V-neck with a large flounce at the top, a seam at the waist and a wide, straight-cut skirt. Low-cut back with narrow horizontal ties, and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.

Long dress in airy chiffon crêpe made partly from recycled polyester. V-neck with a large flounce at the top, a seam at the waist and a wide, straight-cut skirt. Low-cut back with narrow horizontal ties, and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Sports top in fast-drying, printed functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and visible flatlock seams.
Wide-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front, cap sleeves and a longer, sewn-in vest top with a racer back.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel.
Polo shirt in a fine-knit viscose and nylon blend with a ribbed collar, button placket, short, rib-trimmed sleeves and ribbing at the hem.
Polo shirt in a fine-knit viscose and nylon blend with a ribbed collar, button placket, short, rib-trimmed sleeves and ribbing at the hem.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with a rounded collar, press-studs at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and a double-layered lace skirt.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with a rounded collar, press-studs at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and a double-layered lace skirt.
Trousers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Legs with a print and appliqués on the knees and ribbed hems.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy linen and viscose weave. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the top and a zip fly and buttons. Side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Wide top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
